title: How do I check the available storage space in my phone storage and microSD card?
answer:
Go to Settings and touch Storage. Touch Phone storage to check the total and available space in the phone storage. Touch SD card to check the total and available space in your microSD card. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109631)
